actionCalls.name: X2_Days_Prior_To_Action_Due_User_Notification
actionCalls.label: 2 Days Prior To Action Due User Notification

decisions.description: if the current Action is a Parent Record Type but does not have any Actions related to it then change to Standard Record Type.
decisions.name: Action_Record_Type_Update_Needed
decisions.label: Action Record Type Update Needed?

decisions.description: If more than 0 Actions are Closed and the # Closed Actions = Total # Actions and Parent Status != Closed then update Parent Action to Closed Completed. Otherwise skip.
decisions.name: All_Closed_Actions
decisions.label: All Closed Actions?

decisions.description: If more than 0 Actions are Pending and the # Pending Actions = Total # Actions and Parent Status != Pending then update Parent Action to Pending. Otherwise skip.
decisions.name: All_Pending_Actions
decisions.label: All Pending Actions?

decisions.description: If more than 1 Action from the Parent Action is overdue and Parent Status != Overdue then update the Parent Status = Overdue
decisions.name: Any_Actions_Overdue
decisions.label: Any Actions Overdue?

decisions.description: If more than 0 Actions are In Progress and 0 Actions are Overdue and Parent Status != In Progress then update Parent Action to In Progress. Otherwise skip.
decisions.name: Any_In_Progress_Actions
decisions.label: Any In Progress Actions

decisions.description: Temporary Decision element to suppress all emails for Actions.
decisions.name: Copy_1_of_SUPPRESS_EMAILS
decisions.label: TEMPORARY SUPPRESS EMAILS

decisions.description: Temporary Decision element to suppress all emails for Actions.
decisions.name: Copy_2_of_SUPPRESS_EMAILS
decisions.label: TEMPORARY SUPPRESS EMAILS

decisions.description: Temporary Decision element to suppress all emails for Actions.
decisions.name: Copy_3_of_SUPPRESS_EMAILS
decisions.label: TEMPORARY SUPPRESS EMAILS

decisions.name: Is_Action_Pending_or_In_Progress
decisions.label: Is Action Pending or In Progress

decisions.description: If this Action is linked to a Parent Action but the Parent Action's Record Type is not Parent then update it to Parent Record Type.
decisions.name: Parent_Action_Record_Type_Update_Needed
decisions.label: Parent Action Record Type Update Needed?

decisions.description: If the Action has a Parent and the Parent's Due Date is BEFORE the Action's due date then update the Parent's Due Date accordingly.
decisions.name: Parent_Due_Date_Update_Required
decisions.label: Parent Due Date Update Required?

decisions.description: If Parent Action lookup is populated then validate that Parent's Status is set correctly based on its Children Actions' statuses.
decisions.name: Parent_Populated_Decision
decisions.label: Parent Populated?

decisions.description: Temporary Decision element to suppress all emails for Actions.
decisions.name: SUPPRESS_EMAILS_7DaysPost
decisions.label: TEMPORARY SUPPRESS EMAILS

recordLookups.name: Get_All_Actions_for_Parent_Action
recordLookups.label: Get All Actions for Parent Action

recordUpdates.description: Set Parent Record to Record Type = Parent
recordUpdates.name: Set_Parent_Action_Record_Type
recordUpdates.label: Set Parent Action Record Type

recordUpdates.name: Update_Parent_Action_Status_In_Progress
recordUpdates.label: Update Parent Action Status - In Progress
